main.educational: For educational purposes only. Like it?

profile.title: My Profile
profile.displayNameHint: This name will be shown in game (1-16 characters).
profile.nameWarning: Hytale has specific nicknames pattern. Use English characters and numbers (0-9) only, avoiding special symbols and spaces (exceptions: '-', '_')
profile.uuidWarning: Your unique identifier for multiplayer. Changing this will reset your skin!

generalSettings.title: General Settings
generalSettings.launcherStorageHint: Location where launcher data and game files are stored.
generalSettings.updateChannelHint: You will receive stable releases only.
generalSettings.closeLauncherHint: Close the launcher automatically when the game starts.
generalSettings.disableNewsHint: Hide the news feed from the main menu.

languageSettings.title: Language Settings
languageSettings.interfaceLanguageHint: Select your preferred language for the launcher interface
languageSettings.note: Note: Some text may remain in English until full localization is complete. The developers are actively localizing the launcher so that everyone can enjoy using it.

dataSettings.title: Data Management
dataSettings.gameDirectoryHint: Location where installed game instances are stored.
dataSettings.launcherDataHint: Location where launcher configuration and assets are stored.
dataSettings.cleanDataHint: Remove temporary files and caches to free up space.

aboutSettings.title: HyPrism Launcher
aboutSettings.authRole: Creator and Maintainer of the Auth Server
aboutSettings.contributorsDescription: Awesome people that helped in the creation of this launcher
aboutSettings.disclaimer: HyPrism is not an official Hytale launcher or a product developed by Hypixel Studios

profileEditor.title: Profile Editor
profileEditor.dropSkin: Drop your skin file here or use the buttons below

deleteProfile.title: Delete Profile?
deleteProfile.message: Are you sure you want to delete
deleteProfile.warning: This will permanently delete all profile data, including:

update.pleaseWait: Please wait while we download and install the game files.
update.autoLaunch: The game will launch automatically when ready.

modManager.title: Mod Manager
modManager.allUpToDate: All mods are up to date!
